website_summaries.verdict: A premium chromium supplement in a highly absorbent form that offers superior efficacy and fewer side effects.
pros: Made by a company committed to excellence
Bound to niacin for enhanced bio-availability
GMO-free with no artificial colors, preservatives, sweeteners, fillers, or gluten
Users praise its ability to curb sugar cravings and stabilize blood sugar
cons: More expensive than other forms of chromium

customer_reviews.title: PROVEN RESULTS CONVINCED A SKEPTIC!
customer_reviews.text: I admit that I’m a skeptic in every possible way when it comes to nutritional supplements. This brand’s formulation has convinced me that it helps to keep an open mind while still being skeptical and shop wisely. Within a few days of taking this supplement, my fasting glucose levels dropped over 20 mg/dL. I’ve taken the same form of chromium and dosage from other brands without having the same positive results. Without a doubt, this product has given me my money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: The best brand ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've placed 9 orders for this and am happy to inform that my husband who is a Type 1 Diabetic the past 44 years (was just 22) had a high A1C of 9.6 for 20 years. Chromemate decreased it to just 6.7 in just 2 months taking 4 capsules a day. His endocrinologist who's a skeptic was in shock. An awesome brand with no fillers.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive approach to resolving blood sugar/pre-diabetic issues
customer_reviews.text: Small, easy to swallow and is resolving my glucose tolerance issues after 7 months of regular usage. I have the blood test results to prove it. Chromate won't fix your blood sugar if you eat garbage and fail to exercise, but if you are serious about your diet and health and still have glucose intolerance issues, give this product a try. There are no contraindications that I am aware of. I take 8 a day and I have no affiliate relationship with this company. It's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rose McConnell

customer_reviews.title: I am thrilled with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking Chromium Picolinate for almost a year due to prediabetis but did not see any difference in my A1C. I started taking This product about 3 weeks ago. After a week I noticed a difference. First I didn’t have that constant hunger All.The.Time. I was no longer constantly snacking and started seeing my weight go down .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chromium Polynicotinate works noticeably best for me
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I use this high quality chromium supplement daily. Chromium Polynicotinate works noticeably best for me, albeit, I occasionally substitute GTF and Picolinate just as an occasional metabolic "variety break." Pure Encapsulations has great products; this, being no exception. Very happy with the product and always delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy H

product_meta.title: Pure Encapsulations - ChromeMate GTF 600 - Unique Chromium Polynicotinate Supplement - 180 Capsules
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingChromium is important for metabolism, and enzyme activation. One study showed that when combined with modest diet and exercise, ChromeMate supports lean body composition in overweight women. A similar study at Georgetown University also recently suggested that ChromeMate may support lean muscle mass in overweight women. The potential for ChromeMate to promote Glucose Tolerance Factor (GTF) activity accounts for its roles in maintaining healthy glucose metabolism and supporting body composition.*
feature_bullets: Weight Management Support**: Reseach showed that when combined with modest diet and exercise, ChromeMate supports a healthy body composition in overweight women.*

Metabolism Support: Chromium, a critical component of the Glucose Tolerance Factor (GTF) activity accounts for its roles in maintaining healthy glucose metabolism and supporting healthy body composition.*
Enhanced Support: ChromeMate provides all the benefits of chromium, enhanced with the additional benefits of nicotinic acid.*

Pure Ingredients: Pure Encapsulations manufactures a line of hypoallergenic, research-based dietary supplements. Products are meticulously formulated using pure ingredients designed to deliver predictable results for the benefit of all patients, even the most sensitive.*

Free From: Pure Encapsulations products are free from wheat, gluten, egg, peanuts, magnesium stearate, hydrogenated fat, artificial sweeteners and colors, and other unnecessary excipients. Any product containing ingredients derived from allergens, such as soy, dairy or shellfish is clearly labeled. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
